question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. Saltwater crocodile is the largest of all living reptiles
  2. Saltwater crocodile is one of the endangered species in the IUCN red list
Which among the above is / are correct statements?
explanation: Saltwater Crocodile comes under least concerned. It is largest of all living reptiles, as well as the largest terrestrial and riparian predator in the world.
